entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] [Regression] CarouselView throws unhandled java.lang.RuntimeException paging through images - Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap #13182
  • [Maps] [Regression] Maps don't scroll correctly when used in a TabbedPage #13181
  • .NET MAUI CollectionView item's DataTemplate's root container's SemanticProperties.Hint doesn't get set on the item #13178
  • [iOS] Pressing next into a ListView or TableView goes to last element #13176
  • Set DatePicker Style #13169
    Backlog
  • Created default .NET MAUI project with .NET 7 yest there are over 94 build errors #13160
  • Tap Gesture Rezogniser for polygon shape bug #13159
  • Basic Authentication via HTTPClientHandler not working for Android #13158
  • On Windows, ImageButton is set to isEnable=false. When isEnable=true is set, the button status is gray #13157
  • DatePicker doesnt fire for DateSelected event on same date #13156
    Backlog
  • How to switch AndroidManifest.xml for multiple Android builds. #13155
  • Screen flickering while entry is "password" type #13154
  • IllegalStateException: ShellPageContainer#onMeasure() did not set the measured dimension by calling setMeasuredDimenstion() #13152
    Backlog
  • Images in common MAUI resources, are not accessible by resource id in Android platform code #13151

Closed

  • DateTime.Now and DateTime.UtcNow.ToLocalTime() returns UTC time on IPhone and IPad #7903
  • [Mac]Fail to install 7.0 MAUI from main branch with error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.sdk.ios version 16.2.36... is not found in NuGet feeds" #13012
  • Camera MediaPicker throws error about write external storage on api 31 #13119
  • This issue still persists with the latest release version #13029
    Backlog
  • App crash when initialize a delegate class from native library binding #13142
  • I broke CI and I am sad! #13175
  • Changing `<DataTemplate/>` contents can give a runtime exception #11203
    Backlog
  • C # long/Int64 type conversion error！ #13116
  • Setter TargetName="check" Property="Opacity" breaks hot reload #10915
    Backlog
  • Removing the entire ContentPage.Resources element does not trigger the UI updates #11877
    Backlog
  • SwipeView Icon is not working on iOS #12875
    Backlog
  • Alerts in Blazor and WebView on Windows do not look nice #6961
  • Can't access Maui's xaml schema #11841
  • How to downgrade maui sdk from 7.0.58 to 7.0.52 #12998
  • MAUI tutorial application won't build for Android emulator #9217

PullRequests

Created

  • [build] pass $(RestoreConfigFile) to Workloads.csproj #13180
  • [net7.0] backport of #13171 #13179
  • Fix a couple life cycle scenarios on shell modals #13177
  • [iOS] Better Find Next Textfield Algo #13174
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 8.0-preview2
  • feat: Added nullable annotations for IValueConverter. #13173
    community ✨
  • Merge main into net8.0 #13166
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove Compatibility packages by default #13165
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.10 to 120.0.0.11 #13164
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 118.1.0 to 118.1.0.1 #13163
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2.1 #13162
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Ensure OnMeasure always calls SetMeasuredDimension in ShellPageContainer #13153
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix the WorkloadManifest.json #13172
    area/setup 🪄
  • Add some capabilities! #13171
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [listview] fixes for various null/empty DataTemplate #13146
    area/ListView
  • Remove Navigation workaround in tests #13170
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix issue using SVG in SwipeItem Icon #12882
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Add the new dll to the sign list #13168
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview1] update to xamarin/xamarin-android/release/8.0.1xx-preview1@4530fc2 #13167
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13149
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    partner/cat 😻, area/setup 🪄
  • [iOS] Simplify the code used to set the same font size for Editor/Entry. #13150

Updated

  • [Windows] Fix issue with caching the page that holds unfocused control #13028
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟
  • - Simplify and fix flyout offset measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • 1100-Enhancement-DatePicker-supports-nullable-(Selected)-Date #9727
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
    area/shell 🐢
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Align dash effect between Border and Shapes #12693
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Avoid to update Shell Toolbar colors if already disposed the Tracker #12539
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Shell TitleView rendering issues on iOS 16 #12834
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16, control-titleview
  • [Android] Avoid to disconnect a disposed PlatformView on Android #12881
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix crash setting SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage #12924
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • [Windows] Close the WebView2 disconnecting the Handler #12925
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Fix issue rendering Button Background gradient with shadow #13022
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [All platforms] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Update Essentials API Docs Misc #12996
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix Shell FlyoutBackground property #13132
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
